place.name: TREFILAN
place.gazetteerText: TREFILAN, a parish, with Talsarn hamlet, in Lampeter district, Cardigan; 6 miles NNW of Lampeter r. station. Post town, Lampeter, under Carmarthen. Acres, 2,201. Real property, £1,229. Pop., 313. Houses, 62. The property is divided among a few. The living is a rectory in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £77. Patron, the Bishop of St. D. The church was rebuilt in 1806. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
